application.name: apolloPanDetect
application.brief: Detect the timing marks, fiducial marks, and edges of an Apollo panoramic camera image.
application.description: Detect the timing marks, fiducial marks, and edges of an Apollo panoramic camera image.

parameter.name: TILENUMBER
parameter.brief: Which tile in the image to detect. This is for correcting a single tile or detecting images with fewer than 8 tiles.
parameter.description: Which tile in the image to detect. This will result in only running detection on a single tile.

parameter.name: TILETIF
parameter.brief: The tif file to use if detecting a single tile.
parameter.description: The tif file to use if detecting a single tile. If not entered, the image files will be taken from /work/projects/as15pan/AS15-P-####.

parameter.name: TIFLIST
parameter.brief: A list of tif image files for overriding the standard image files.
parameter.description: A list of tif image files ordered from tile 1 to tile 8 that will override the standard image files. If not entered, image files will be taken from /work/projects/as15pan/.

parameter.name: PREFIX
parameter.brief: The output file prefix that will be appended with AS15-P-####_000#.pvl.
parameter.description: The prefix for the output pvl files that will be appended with AS15-P-####_000#.pvl. This can include a path to a directory, but must end with /.
